description: Demonstrates blank-by-default entities that opt into modules via single tags (needs/relations/profile/agency).

entityCounts.description: Blank entities that opt into Needs module via NeedsModuleTag.
Blank entities that opt into Relations module via RelationsModuleTag.
Blank entities that opt into Profile module via ProfileModuleTag.
Blank entities that opt into Agency module via AgencyModuleTag.
Blank entities that opt into Needs + Relations + Profile + Agency modules.
